quote: There are many faiths, but the spirit is one â€” in me, and in you, and in him. So that if everyone believes himself, all will be united; everyone be himself and all will be as one.
quote_letters: THERE ARE MANY FAITHS BUT THE SPIRIT IS ONE - IN ME AND IN YOU AND IN HIM SO THAT IF EVERYONE BELIEVES HIMSELF ALL WILL BE UNITED EVERYONE BE HIMSELF AND ALL WILL BE AS ONE
